remarks: Lemma for falling factorial closure laws.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 5-Jan-2018.)
statement:
risefallfaccllem.1 $e |- S C_ CC $.
risefallfaccllem.2 $e |- 1 e. S $.
risefallfaccllem.3 $e |- ( ( x e. S /\ y e. S ) -> ( x x. y ) e. S ) $.
fallfaccllem.4 $e |- ( ( A e. S /\ k e. NN0 ) -> ( A - k ) e. S ) $.
fallfaccllem $p |- ( ( A e. S /\ N e. NN0 ) -> ( A FallFac N ) e. S ) $.
$d A k x y $.
$d N k x y $.
$d S k x y $.
